long_description: Perfect as a layering top, the women's REI Lightweight crew shirt is an easy choice for stop-and-go activities in cool weather. Polyester and spandex fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly. Fabric protects skin against harmful ultraviolet light with a UPF rating of 50+ and is very soft to the touch. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. The women's REI Lightweight crew shirt features a next-to-skin fit that hugs the body and boosts fabric performance.
short_description: Perfect as a layering top, the women's REI Lightweight crew shirt is an easy choice for stop-and-go activities in cool weather.
